Jack Jay-Z rap on nostr

https://player.wavlake.com/debasedghost

Wavlake is live - connect a node, upload your music, get sats, listen and comment. Boosts and comments work similarly to Fountain/Breez and other V4V (value for value) platforms.

I used wavlake alpha (artist: debasedghost) and have one track up on the new platform (link above).

There's a ton of great tunes up already, and you'll be able to upload podcasts separately in the future.

i don't work with wavlake, just a fan and uploader. sam means of lightning.store is behind the project

Do you know this artist?
I am loveskaâ€™s manager
Cool! I'll check out his music

Old Love is a collection of old tracks we re released on wavlake, with more to follow. Iâ€™m implementing a web5 strategy with Loveska (Nostr, podcasting 2.0, value for value). Weâ€™ve known each other for years, and we began working together a few weeks ago.

Iâ€™ll be updating his website and web presence over the next few months, as well as opening a label. 

Loveska is a talented song writer, pianist, and multi-instrument generalist. Iâ€™m watching for projects involving video game sound design, composing music for soundtracks, licensing music for content, collaborative releases, remixes, and studio session work. 

Any of yâ€™all can contact me through debasedghost@hodl.rodeo (or here on discord)
